tool_name: US Sales Tax Rate By Zipcode
tool_description: Sales tax calculation based on ZIPCODE. Provide realtime and accurate US Sales Tax Rate by Zipcode. (FREE TRIAL)

api_list.name: salestax_rate
api_list.description: Returns detailed sales tax data given the zip_code.

required_parameters.name: zip_code
required_parameters.description: The ZIP code for which the sales tax rate is requested.
